title: Genetically Modified Foods - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/22/21
itunes:title: Genetically Modified Foods - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/22/21
description:
George Noory and author Jeffrey Smith explore his research into scientific efforts to alter the genetic makeup of food seeds and crops, and how unintentional mistakes could lead to serious threats to the world's food supply.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
